title: Work Page Row Configuration
description: Configuration of a work page row
$comment: FIXME list of attributes not yet finalized

title.description: Represents the title of the Row

info.description: Represents an additional info of the Row shown next to the title

fillRowHeight.description: Indicates whether the last Widget contained in each Column->Cell of this Row should stretch to the height of the row. This visually unifies the height of all contents.

fullWidth.description: Visually expands the Rows width to the maximum available width. The expansion only applies to background setting

backgroundColor.description: CSS color value used as a background for this Row

backgroundURL.description: Url to a background image for this Row

paddingTop.description: Padding on top of the Row

paddingBottom.description: Padding on bottom of the Row
